ZuluCall+ is an all-in-one WebRTC-based Chrome extension designed to bring a full-fledged communication experience directly to your browser. With advanced features like incoming/outgoing calls, Do Not Disturb (DND), chat, contact management, and voicemail transcription, ZuluCall+ is the solution for modern communication at your fingertips.

Key Features:

Incoming & Outgoing Calls : 
	Seamless Calling: Make and receive calls directly from your browser with WebRTC technology, no additional apps required.
	Call History: Keep track of all your call logs with a simple and organized interface.

Do Not Disturb (DND) : 
	Instant Toggle: Activate DND with a single click to stop receiving incoming calls and notifications during important meetings or downtime.
	Customizable Settings: Control who can reach you while you're in DND mode, ensuring that urgent calls can still get through if needed.

Chat : 
	Real-Time Messaging: Communicate with your contacts instantly via text messages alongside your calls.
	Message History: Keep a history of all chats, allowing for easy reference to past discussions.

Manage Contacts : 
	Organized Contact List: Add, update, and manage your contacts directly in the extension.
	Searchable Directory: Quickly search for contacts and find the right person to call or message.
	Sync Across Devices: Sync your contact list across PBX using API.

Voicemail Transcription : 
	Transcription: Automatically transcribe voicemails into text for easy reading, saving time and ensuring you donâ€™t miss any important messages.
	Voice-to-Text: Quickly access transcriptions directly from the PBX.
	Searchable Voicemails: Search through your voicemails and transcriptions to find specific messages and keywords.
